# completionDate

**Instance Property**

The date on which the reminder was completed.

## Declaration

```swift
var completionDate: Date? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property to a date will set [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKReminder/isCompleted] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]; setting this property to `nil` will set `completed` to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing Reminder Properties

- **EKReminderPriority**: The priority of the reminder.
- **priority**: The reminder’s priority.
- **startDateComponents**: The start date of the task.
- **dueDateComponents**: The date by which the reminder should be completed.
- **isCompleted**: A Boolean value determining whether or not the reminder is marked completed.
